scripts.test-api: newman run API/e2e/Todo_App.postman_collection.json -r htmlextra,cli --reporter-htmlextra-title 'Todo App API Tests' --reporter-htmlextra-dark-mode true --reporter-htmlextra-export ./reports/todo-api-report.html --reporter-htmlextra-displayProgressBar true --reporter-htmlextra-show-test-summary true --reporter-htmlextra-show-test-details true --reporter-htmlextra-show-test-timeline true
